meanings.definition: To convert into or express in the form of currency
meanings.sent1: She monetizes her artwork by selling it at the local market.
meanings.sent2: The artist monetizes her talent by offering commissioned pieces.
meanings.sent3: The painter monetizes her creations with each sale, turning them into money.
meanings.sent4: In her hands, a simple brushstroke monetizes into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Every stroke of her brush monetizes her creativity into tangible value.

meanings.definition: To generate revenue from a website or online platform
meanings.sent1: The blogger monetizes her website through advertisements.
meanings.sent2: Many content creators monetize their YouTube channels with sponsorships.
meanings.sent3: The online store monetizes its traffic by offering exclusive deals.
meanings.sent4: His innovative approach monetizes online traffic like never before.
meanings.sent5: The website's design effectively monetizes user engagement.

meanings.definition: To profit from an investment or asset
meanings.sent1: He monetizes his real estate holdings by renting out properties.
meanings.sent2: Investors aim to monetize their stocks by selling at the right time.
meanings.sent3: The entrepreneur monetizes his business acumen by making strategic investments.
meanings.sent4: She skillfully monetizes her savings into profitable ventures.
meanings.sent5: The wise investor monetizes opportunities into financial gains.
